source.7f6148a6:
values = data['artist'].value_counts().tolist()[:20]
names = list(dict(data['artist'].value_counts()).keys())[:20]

fig = go.Bar(x = names,
             y = values,
             marker = dict(color = 'rgba(30, 215, 96, 0.75)',
                         line=dict(color='rgb(25, 20, 20)',width=1.5)))

layout = go.Layout()

fig = go.Figure(data = fig, layout = layout)

fig.update_layout(title_text='Top Artists')

fig.show()
